name: The Fault
description:
Игра была разработана во время участия в гейм джеме Ludum Dare 48 на базе сообщества авторов игр «Индикатор

Clink on objects to examine them

During the game, you can meet two types of objects: objects with white backlight reveal the life of the protagonist and his victim, and red, in turn, throw the player to the next stage of realizing his position

Press Esc to exit the game

E'Peachyband:

Artist:
SoFarAway //Ignatev Gleb

Scenario & Gamedesign:
